meanings.definition: A printed or online document containing tips or advice on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: I always keep a tipsheet about gardening in my bag for quick reference.
meanings.sent2: She found a helpful tipsheet on budgeting on the internet.
meanings.sent3: The tipsheet on baking had a hilarious cartoon about burnt cookies.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a tipsheet of memories, neatly organized and easily accessible.
meanings.sent5: The tipsheet on time management was like a treasure map to productivity.

meanings.definition: To provide tips or advice in the form of a tipsheet.
meanings.sent1: He tipsheets his colleagues on the best ways to prepare for the presentation.
meanings.sent2: She tipsheets regularly to help newcomers adjust to the work environment.
meanings.sent3: The chef tipsheets the new cooks with quirky rhymes and jokes.
meanings.sent4: His words tipsheeted her path to success like guiding stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The mentor's guidance tipsheeted her through the maze of career choices.
